attributes.action: Acknowledge that he is acting as a fascist. We require an election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown is a failed Chancellor - sale of gold - tax credits for pension funds - tripartite regulatary system - overspending - control of debt - boom and bust. Now he has become an unelected embarrassment to this country. When is he going to start wearing a cap and shiny boots . Brown is mentally ill and incompetent and should go now.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
